title: get_started
text: R Markdown document. Markdown simple formatting syntax authoring HTML, PDF, MS Word documents. details using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. click Knit button document generated includes content well output embedded R code chunks within document. can embed R code chunk like :
code: summary(cars) ##      speed           dist        ##  Min.   : 4.0   Min.   :  2.00   ##  1st Qu.:12.0   1st Qu.: 26.00   ##  Median :15.0   Median : 36.00   ##  Mean   :15.4   Mean   : 42.98   ##  3rd Qu.:19.0   3rd Qu.: 56.00   ##  Max.   :25.0   Max.   :120.00

title: get_started
text: can also embed plots, example:  Note echo = FALSE parameter added code chunk prevent printing R code generated plot.

title: Directory Selection Module Server — browseDirServer
text: module handles server-side logic selecting directory output processing.

title: Directory Selection Module Server — browseDirServer
text: id namespace identifier module. filetype character sting specifying files type use starting  directory path reactiveValues object. default c('csv', 'tsv', 'txt') workspace set default work directory

title: Directory Selection Module Server — browseDirServer
text: None. function used side effects. stores path selected directory provided reactiveValues object.

title: Directory Selection Module Server — browseDirServer
code: if (interactive()) {  ui <- fluidPage(    mainPanel(      browseDirUI("vcfDir1"),      browseDirUI("vcfDir2")    )  )    server <- function(input, output, session) {    Work_Dir <- normalizePath("~")    selected_dir1 <- browseDirServer("vcfDir1")    selected_dir2 <- browseDirServer("vcfDir2")        observe({      print(paste("Directory 1:", selected_dir1()))      print(paste("Directory 2:", selected_dir2()))    }) }    shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server) }

title: Directory Selection Module UI — browseDirUI
text: module provides UI selecting directory output processing.

title: Directory Selection Module UI — browseDirUI
text: id namespace identifier module. label label button. default "Set Output Directory"

title: Directory Selection Module UI — browseDirUI
text: UI definition module.

title: Directory Selection Module UI — browseDirUI
code: if (interactive()) {  ui <- fluidPage(    mainPanel(      browseDirUI("vcfDir1"),      browseDirUI("vcfDir2")    )  )    server <- function(input, output, session) {  Work_Dir <- normalizePath("~")    selected_dir1 <- browseDirServer("vcfDir1")    selected_dir2 <- browseDirServer("vcfDir2")        observe({      print(paste("Directory 1:", selected_dir1()))      print(paste("Directory 2:", selected_dir2()))    }) }    shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server) }

title: Browse File Server — browseFileServer
text: function server logic browse file module.  stores selected file path global reactive value.

title: Browse File Server — browseFileServer
text: id input id module. extension file extension filter . output output needed server side session session needed server side

title: Browse File Server — browseFileServer
text: reactive value containing file path.

title: Browse File Server — browseFileServer
code: if (FALSE) {   library(shiny)    ui <- fluidPage(     browseFileUI("file_input_ui", extension = ".csv")   )    server <- function(input, output, session) {     browseFileServer("file_input_server", extension = ".csv")   }    shinyApp(ui, server) }

title: Browse File — browseFileUI
text: function browse file specific extension.

title: Browse File — browseFileUI
code: browseFileUI(id, extension, label = paste0("Select ", extension, " File"))

title: Browse File — browseFileUI
text: id input id module. extension file extension filter . label label file input.

title: Browse File — browseFileUI
text: list containing reactive value file path.

title: Browse File — browseFileUI
code: if (FALSE) {   library(shiny)    ui <- fluidPage(     browseFileUI("file_input_ui", extension = ".csv")   )    server <- function(input, output, session) {     browseFileServer("file_input_server", extension = ".csv")   }    shinyApp(ui, server) }

title: Icon Dialogue Module Server — iconDialogServer
text: function handles server-side logic icon module.

title: Icon Dialogue Module Server — iconDialogServer
text: id id module. title title modal dialog. message message displayed modal dialog.

title: Icon Dialogue Module Server — iconDialogServer
code: if (FALSE) { server <- function(input, output, session) {   iconDialogServer("info_module", title = "Custom Title", message = "Custom Message")   # Add other server logic as needed } }

title: Icon Dialogue Module UI — iconDialogUI
text: module creates info icon displays message hovered clicked.

title: Icon Dialogue Module UI — iconDialogUI
text: id id module. icon Set Icon model

title: Icon Dialogue Module UI — iconDialogUI
code: if (FALSE) { ui <- fluidPage(   iconDialogUI("info_module", icon),   # Add other UI elements as needed )  server <- function(input, output, session) {   iconDialogServer("info_module", title = "Custom Title", message = "Custom Message")   # Add other server logic as needed }  shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server) }
